stake_desc: The distribution of BTCETF token rewards will occur at a rate of 119 BTCETF tokens per Ethereum (ETH) block. These rewards will be disbursed over a span of five years and will be calculated based on your stake in the pool and the annual returns percentage.
withdraw_text: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
not_enough_eth: Not enough ETH? Top up now
disclaimer: Disclaimer: Cryptocurrency may be unregulated in your jurisdiction. The value of cryptocurrencies may go down as well as up. Profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes applicable in your jurisdiction.
copyright: Copyright 2023 Bitcoin ETF Token. All Rights Reserved.
claim_stale_help: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to stake your BTCETF now. This will automatically claim any rewards and stake all of your BTCETF tokens. Tokens will be locked at least 7 days after the claiming process goes live.
stake_claim_success: All staked tokens will be able to be withdrawn at least 7 days after token claiming went live, depending on your chosen lock period, as long as it's been 7 days since you last staked
stake_transction_info: {{stakeAmount}} BTCETF tokens will be staked once the transaction completes
stake_view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
stake_waiting_approve: In order to stake BTCETF, you first need to authorize us to access the BTCETF in your wallet
transction_info_stake: {{baseToken}} tokens will be purchased and staked once the transaction is confirmed.
transction_info_stake_success: {{baseToken}} tokens have now been staked! Check the dashboard for details.
claim_success: Your tokens have been claimed successfully.
waiting_confirm_stake: In order to buy and stake your BTCETF tokens, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
waiting_confirm_stake_2: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
stake_waiting_confirm: In order to stake BTCETF, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
stake_popup_info: Unclaimed BTCETF that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Staking for BTCETF that was bought using BNB or USDT (BEP-20) can be staked once the presale ends. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
pool_share: BTCETF staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 119 BTCETF per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 119 BTCETF tokens you receive.
your_purchased_popup_info: Your total purchased tokens are all tokens purchased using the connected wallet. This includes all staked and unstaked tokens purchased on Ethereum, BNB Smart Chain and Polygon.
wert_mount_desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert_disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing {{token}} tokens. Your tokens won't be immediately deposited to your wallet. You'll be able to claim them on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim them, they will be deposited to your wallet.
change_chain_info: Are you sure you want to change?
change_swap_text: If you purchase on {{mode}} during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum if you want to stake.
install_app: Scan the appropriate QR code below on your mobile device in order to install the Best Wallet app.
already_have: Already got the Best Wallet app?
hit_btn_connect: Hit the button below and use the QR code scanner in the Best Wallet app in order to connect.
about_head_1: A Token For New Bitcoin ETFs
about_para_1: An exchange-traded fund (ETF) for Bitcoin has been a modern dream for Bitcoin believers for years. From the earliest speculations to an official application by BlackRock, ETFs for Bitcoin now appear inevitable. A flood of spot ETFs is expected to bolster the crypto market with billions or even trillions more dollars. Make sure you buy Bitcoin ETF Token before that happens!
about_para_2: Bitcoin ETF Token is a cryptocurrency tied to the fate of Bitcoin (BTC) and the expected ETF approvals coming from the SEC. Our news feed will keep you abreast of all the latest news surrounding Bitcoin ETFs from around the globe. Subscribe to our social media channels, turn on notifications, and you’ll never miss a beat ahead of these historic events in Bitcoin’s incredible history.
how_to_head: Buy Bitcoin ETF Token in Presale
how_to_para: Buy Bitcoin ETF Token at the lowest possible price to ensure you’re a hodler before the first Bitcoin ETFs are approved!
use_eth_para: Buying BTCETF tokens is easy. You can use ETH, BNB, USDT, or your bank card on our buy widget above. Connect your crypto wallet to the site to proceed. Keep some ETH or BNB for fees.
use_usdt_para: Securing BTCETF tokens in presale is the best way to get ahead of the crowd and buy in at the lowest price, before it is publicly traded. Tokens bought can be claimed once the presale concludes.
use_card_para: You can also buy and stake BTCETF at the same time, allowing you to receive the highest rewards rate by joining the pool early. Staked tokens plus rewards can be claimed 7 days after listing.
blog_subtitle_1: An exchange-traded fund (ETF) for Bitcoin has been a modern dream for Bitcoin believers for years. From the first
roadmap_para: The roadmap for Bitcoin ETF Token is linked to real-life Bitcoin events. BTCETF tokens are burned and staking rewards are increased as every Bitcoin ETF milestone is reached.
roadmap_1_para: Our first focus is to gather the BTCETF community and raise awareness about our aim to fill everybody’s bags before the first Bitcoin ETF approval. A fair presale establishes a strong community.
roadmap_2_para: During the presale phase we are initiating marketing that highlights why people need to hold BTCETF tokens as well as BTC before the SEC approves the first Bitcoin ETF, emphasizing its significance.
roadmap_3_para: After launching on DEX, a burning mechanism reduces the token supply with each transaction, increasing scarcity. Transaction tax decreases by 1% each time a Bitcoin ETF milestone is reached.
roadmap_4_para: A total of 25% of the BTCETF token supply is set to be removed from circulation as Bitcoin matures in the global market - 5% of the total supply is burned for every BTCETF milestone passed.
pop_cont1_1: Total BTCETF trading volume hits $100 million
pop_cont1_2: 5% of total supply is burned (105,000,000 tokens)
pop_cont2_1: SEC approves first Bitcoin ETF in the U.S.
pop_cont2_2: Another 5% of total supply is burned (105,000,000 tokens)
pop_cont3_1: First Bitcoin ETF launches in the U.S.
pop_cont3_2: Another 5% of total supply is burned (105,000,000 tokens)
pop_cont4_1: Bitcoin ETF assets under management (AUM) hits $1 billion value
pop_cont4_2: Another 5% of total supply is burned (105,000,000 tokens)
pop_cont5_1: The BTC price closes a daily candle above $100,000
pop_cont5_2: Another 5% of total supply is burned (105,000,000 tokens)
faq_head_1: What is the purpose of the BTCETF token?
faq_head_2: Where is the value in staking?
faq_head_3: What are the tokenomics for BTCETF?
faq_head_5: How do I contact the team?
faq_cont_1: Bitcoin ETF Token (BTCETF) is an ERC-20 token that can be staked in our verified smart contract to earn passive rewards at a dynamic rate. It has been created to celebrate the expected arrival of Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. financial markets.
faq_cont_2: Staking is an automated and decentralized way of locking up tokens for a period of time in order to earn more of those tokens, at a certain rate. In the case of BTCETF, the rate of rewards depends on how many tokens you stake, and the total amount of tokens staked by the community.
faq_cont_3: No, Bitcoin ETF Token is not linked to any Bitcoin ETF products that may enter the market. The roadmap does, however, correspond with actual events that are expected to occur in the crypto markets.
faq_cont_4: Follow our official channels to get the latest Bitcoin ETF Token news and updates. For team contact or marketing enquiries, reach out to a moderator in our Telegram channel (link below).

meme_token: BTCETF is a meme token, and is not an ETF in any way, shape or form.
presale_soldout_desc: BTCETF Token claim will go live at 12 PM on December 21st, 2023, UTC.
just_claim: Just want to claim without staking? Click here
stake_now_desc: You can now claim and stake your tokens. Staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after you last added tokens to the staking pool. Use 0x3c87AAff27f1085B67cd742302939a50E2F2d406 to add BTCETF to your wallet.
claim_help: In order to confirm your transaction, please check your wallet. Sometimes the wallet may not alert you when a transaction is submitted, however you should now see a transaction which you can sign in your wallet of choice.
wintdraw_date: You can withdraw your tokens from {{unstakeDate}}
